languages.text: {n}Вскоре пелена растворяется, и образы сходятся в лицо Идиры, с любопытством следящей за вами.{/n} "Ну как, Лорд-капитан, вы снова в порядке?"
{n}After a while, the haze dissipates and the images arrange themselves into the shape of Idira's face. She is watching you curiously.{/n} "Can you hear me, Lord Captain? Are you all right?"
languages.original_text: {n}Вскоре пелена растворяется, и образы сходятся в лицо Идиры, с любопытством следящей за вами.{/n} "Ну как, Лорд-капитан, вы снова в порядке?"

traits.locale_text: {n}The haze dissipates after a while, the images re-forming into Idira's face observing you curiously.{/n} "Doing all right, Lord Captain? You back yet?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The haze dissipates after a while, the images re-forming into Idira's face observing you curiously.{/n} "Doing all right, Lord Captain? You back yet?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}After a while, the haze dissipates and the images arrange themselves into the shape of Idira's face. She is watching you curiously.{/n} "Can you hear me, Lord Captain? Are you all right?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Au bout de quelques instants, le brouillard dans votre esprit se dissipe et les images prennent la forme du visage d'Idira, qui vous regarde d'un air curieux.{/n} « Vous m'entendez, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ? Est-ce que ça va ? »
languages.original_text: {n}After a while, the haze dissipates and the images arrange themselves into the shape of Idira's face. She is watching you curiously.{/n} "Can you hear me, Lord Captain? Are you all right?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Au bout de quelques instants, le brouillard dans votre esprit se dissipe et les images prennent la forme du visage d'Idira, qui vous regarde d'un air curieux.{/n} « Vous m'entendez, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ? Est-ce que ça va ? »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Después de un rato, la niebla se disipa y las imágenes se unen para formar el rostro de Idira. Te observa con curiosidad.{/n} «¿Puede oírme, Lord Capitán? ¿Se encuentra bien?».
languages.original_text: {n}After a while, the haze dissipates and the images arrange themselves into the shape of Idira's face. She is watching you curiously.{/n} "Can you hear me, Lord Captain? Are you all right?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Después de un rato, la niebla se disipa y las imágenes se unen para formar el rostro de Idira. Te observa con curiosidad.{/n} «¿Puede oírme, Lord Capitán? ¿Se encuentra bien?».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}过了一会儿，烟雾消散了，眼前的一切重新排列成伊迪拉的脸。她好奇地盯着你看。{/n}“能听到我说话吗，舰长大人？你感觉怎么样了？”
languages.original_text: {n}After a while, the haze dissipates and the images arrange themselves into the shape of Idira's face. She is watching you curiously.{/n} "Can you hear me, Lord Captain? Are you all right?"

traits.locale_text: {n}过了一会儿，烟雾消散了，眼前的一切重新排列成伊迪拉的脸。她好奇地盯着你看。{/n}“能听到我说话吗，舰长大人？你感觉怎么样了？”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}しばらくすると、靄は消え、映像はイディラの顔の形になった。彼女は不思議そうにあなたを見ている。{/n}「聞こえますかロード・キャプテン？大丈夫ですか？」
languages.original_text: {n}After a while, the haze dissipates and the images arrange themselves into the shape of Idira's face. She is watching you curiously.{/n} "Can you hear me, Lord Captain? Are you all right?"

traits.locale_text: {n}しばらくすると、靄は消え、映像はイディラの顔の形になった。彼女は不思議そうにあなたを見ている。{/n}「聞こえますかロード・キャプテン？大丈夫ですか？」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Nach einer Weile löst sich der Dunst auf und die Bilder arrangieren sich zu der Form von Idiras Gesicht. Sie beobachtet dich interessiert.{/n} "Könnt Ihr mich hören, Lord Captain? Geht es Euch gut?"
languages.original_text: {n}After a while, the haze dissipates and the images arrange themselves into the shape of Idira's face. She is watching you curiously.{/n} "Can you hear me, Lord Captain? Are you all right?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Nach einer Weile löst sich der Dunst auf und die Bilder arrangieren sich zu der Form von Idiras Gesicht. Sie beobachtet dich interessiert.{/n} "Könnt Ihr mich hören, Lord Captain? Geht es Euch gut?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Bir süre sonra sis dağılıyor ve imgeler tekrar biçim alıp İdira'nın yüzüne dönüşüyor. Seni merakla izliyor.{/n} "Beni duyabiliyor musun Lord Kaptan? İyi misin?"
languages.original_text: {n}After a while, the haze dissipates and the images arrange themselves into the shape of Idira's face. She is watching you curiously.{/n} "Can you hear me, Lord Captain? Are you all right?"
